Audio.Author: Roney Assis Souza
Audio.Comments: In the canopy of a Atlantic forest's fragment. I did not see the birds. In this fragment I heard Myiopagis caniceps, Tolmomyias flaviventris and I saw Tolmomyias sulphurescens, Myiornis auricularis and Tangara palmarum. It was near a lake.bird-seen:noplayback-used:no
